function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Presence of SARS-CoV-2 in human wastewater","Impact":"Potential risk of viral transmission through wastewater","Mitigation":"Implement effective wastewater treatment processes to eliminate the virus","Technologies":"Advanced wastewater treatment technologies, such as UV disinfection","People":"Airport personnel, airport visitors, wastewater treatment plant workers","Owner":"Wastewater treatment plant operators, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Enteric involvement in hospitalised patients with COVID-19","Impact":"Potential for gastrointestinal symptoms in patients with COVID-19","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring and testing of gastrointestinal symptoms in COVID-19 patients","Technologies":"Diagnostic testing for SARS-CoV-2 RNA in stool samples","People":"Hospital medical staff, patients with COVID-19","Owner":"Medical institutions, public health authorities"}]}
